content.p: Across the faculty, there are various ways in which we are offering valuable services and knowledge transfer to businesses and building strong links with industry. We have technology, knowledge, research and people that can be utilised by companies to aid their processes and improve the way they work. We want to understand your firm and to help you tackle the real-life issues facing your sector today. We want to develop partnerships with you to ensure long-term benefits to your organisation. You can find out about the services offered by our individual schools on their school websites. The School of Chemistry Business Partnership Unit (BPU) stimulates and supports innovation at the academic-business interface. The Technology Transfer Office commercialises technologies which have been developed through research. Knowledge Transfer Partnerships is a governmental scheme where firms can makes use of graduates' skills. The University of Nottingham University Park Nottingham, NG7 2RD
